sentences.sContent: Unfortunately his domestic life wasn’t very happy.
sentences.sCn: 不幸的是，他的家庭生活并不幸福。

sentences.sContent: ...As we widely know that the relationship between parents and children plays a significant role in the domestic relationship...

...Parents and students who have invested heavily in higher education worry about graduates' job prospects as technological advances and changes in domestic and global markets transform professions in ways that reduce wages and cut jobs...
...Her answer so surprised me that I decided to ask some of the other developers who were also parents what their domestic ground rules for screen time were...
...To what extent are Americans really willing to endure the environmental impacts of domestic energy production in order to cut back imports...
...The government now backs up the domestic car industry...

synos.tran: 国内的；家庭的；驯养的；一心只管家务的

phrases.pCn: 国内需求；本地内部需求
国内消费；生活用电量；家庭用水量

words.tran: 家养的；驯服的；喜欢家庭生活的
国内地；家庭式地；适合国内地
家庭生活；专心于家务；对家庭的挚爱
驯养（domesticate的过去分词）；使习惯于家庭生活
驯养；使习惯于或喜爱家务和家庭生活

trans.tranCn: 本国的； 家庭的； 驯养的
trans.tranOther: relating to or happening in one particular country and not involving any other countries
